document_data.mainbody:
Rampah was a destitute man who lived in the city of Athkatla in the midâ€“14 century DR.
He spent his time begging for coins in the citys bridge district.
In the , Rampah became inadvertently involved with the "Skinner murders" that plagued the city. He found a small bit of elephant hide near one of the murder victims.
